title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 1585/89 of 7 June 1989 concerning the classification of certain goods in the combined nomenclature
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 1585/89
of 7 June 1989
concerning the classification of certain goods in the combined nomenclature
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The good described in column 1 of the annexed table are now classified within the combined nomenclature under the appropriate CN code indicated in column 2 of the said table.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the 21st day after its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 7 June 1989.
For the Commission
Christiane SCRIVENER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 256, 7. 9. 1987, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 148, 1. 6. 1989, p. 1.
ANNEX
1.2.3 //  //  //  // Description of the goods  // CN code classification   // Reasons  //  //  //  // (1)  // (2)  // (3)  //  //  //  // Synthetic paraffin wax having a molecular weight of not less than 460 and not more than 1 560 containing by weight less than 0,75 % of oil   // 2712 20 00  // Classification is determined by the provisions of general rules 1 and 6 for the interpretation of the combined nomenclature and the texts of CN codes 2712 and 2712 20 00. (See also CN explanatory notes to code 2712 20 00)   //    //  //
